title: Schwarzenegger in Korea to Promote New 'Terminator' Film
text:
They reunited after 28 years in "Terminator: Dark Fate," in which they reprise their roles from the first two Terminator films.

Hollywood stars Arnold Schwarzenegger and Linda Hamilton appeared at a press event for their latest Terminator installment in Seoul on Monday.

The two said they were delighted to work together again on the film, which was directed by Tim Miller and produced by action-movie legend James Cameron, who directed the original Terminator film.

Schwarzenegger also talked about how he and Hamilton both trained hard to overcome the physical limitations of age while shooting the film.

With the reunion of the two stars and Cameron on board, expectations are high among fans for the latest film, which is set to hit Korean theaters on Oct. 30.
description: Schwarzenegger in Korea to Promote New 'Terminator' Film
